mapper.select: SELECT P.PRDT_NAME, SUM(O.ORD_AMNT) AS COUNT, DATE_FORMAT(O.REG_DT, '%Y-%m') AS REG_DT FROM PRODUCT_INFO P, ORDER_ITEM O WHERE P.PRDT_NO = O.PRDT_NO AND O.REG_DT LIKE '2017%' GROUP BY O.PRDT_NO ORDER BY COUNT DESC
SELECT SUM(ORD_AMNT) AS COUNT, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM ORDER_ITEM WHERE REG_DT >DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d');

SELECT COUNT(ORD_NO) AS COUNT, DATE_FORMAT(ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, SUM(TOTAL_ORD_PRICE)/1000 AS PRICE FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE ORD_DT > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d');

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(O.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, IFNULL(M.COUNT,0) AS MALE_COUNT, IFNULL(F.COUNT,0) AS FEMALE_COUNT FROM ORDER_INFO O LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(OI.ORD_NO) AS COUNT, OI.ORD_DT AS ORD_DT FROM ORDER_INFO OI, USER_INFO UI WHERE OI.USER_NO = UI.USER_NO AND UI.GENDER = '남자' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(OI.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d'), UI.GENDER ) M ON O.ORD_DT = M.ORD_DT LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(OI.ORD_NO) AS COUNT, OI.ORD_DT AS ORD_DT FROM ORDER_INFO OI, USER_INFO UI WHERE OI.USER_NO = UI.USER_NO AND UI.GENDER = '여자' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(OI.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d'), UI.GENDER) F ON O.ORD_DT = F.ORD_DT GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(O.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d');

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(O.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT,COUNT(O.ORD_NO) AS MALE_COUNT FROM ORDER_INFO O, USER_INFO U WHERE U.USER_NO = O.USER_NO AND U.GENDER = '남자' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(O.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d');

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(O.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT,COUNT(O.ORD_NO) AS FEMALE_COUNT FROM ORDER_INFO O, USER_INFO U WHERE U.USER_NO = O.USER_NO AND U.GENDER = '여자' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(O.ORD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d');
